menuTitle.services: Need help with your projects on the web ?

hero.whatido: I build things for the web.
hero.miniDescription: I'm a software engineer based in Paris specializing in building (and occasionally designing) exceptional websites, applications, and everything in between.

description.p1: Hello ! I’m Amélie, a software engineer based in Paris.
description.p2: Passionate about everything related to web development and and UI/UX Design, I attach great importance to developing clean and properly organized code.
description.p3: I enjoy creating things that live on the internet. My goal is to always build products that provide pixel-perfect, performant experiences.
description.p4: Here are a few technologies I've been working with recently :

contact.message: Contact me to explain your project and see if I can help you !

services1.name: Create of web projects
services1.detail: Showcase website, corporate, events, blog, e-commerce, portfolio.

services2.name: Management of existing projects
services2.detail: Maintenance, additional features, code analysis, overhaul ..
